text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2080. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The fan noise is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GS75 Stealth-202 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 Max-Q 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2080 in the MSI GS75 Stealth-202 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 Max-Q 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

An average performer. The NVIDIA RTX 2080 is good, but I expected a bit more from the build material on the MSI GS75 Stealth-202 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 Max-Q 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.
